title: Hostel URGENT!!
content: Can someone please provide the name of the hostel provided to the EC campus 1st year students . And also what could be the backup option if someone doesnt get hostel at RR campus?

comments.body: Amaatra boys hostel is the 1st year hostel for EC Campus students.
If you don't get hostel in RR you can opt for Pgs nearby or rent a house nearby( I would suggest the later provided you can find roommates).

Can we find pgs or rooms near the college easily??
Im gonna be joining next month and I would appreciate your response
Youâ€™ll find many near the college(RR campus)
